sys_script_include.name: hasBorrow

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_898711_library_m.hasBorrow</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>hasBorrow</name><script><![CDATA[function hasBorrow(bookTitle){
	var borrow = new GlideRecord('x_898711_library_m_book_transaction');
	var ret = false;
	borrow.addQuery('borrowed_book', 'CONTAINS', bookTitle);
	borrow.addEncodedQuery('state=-5^ORstate=2');
	borrow.query();
	gs.info("Records: " +borrow.getRowCount());
// 	if(borrow.getRowCount()>0){
		
// 	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-03 00:33:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>fdf044f7973211103e1f7cb0f053af8c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>hasBorrow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Library Management System" source="x_898711_library_m">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Library Management System">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fdf044f7973211103e1f7cb0f053af8c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-03 00:33:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
